H0.text: Technological design is the term used to describe the development of new technology.

H1.text: Mechanical engineering is the term used to describe the development of new technology.

H2.text: Technological expansion is the term used to describe the development of new technology.

H3.text: Industrial design is the term used to describe the development of new technology.

A4.text: Engineering is the process by which technology is developed.

A5.text: Technology is the application of conceptual knowledge to achieve practical goals, especially in a reproducible way.

A6.text: Industrial design focuses principally on aesthetic and user-interface aspects of products.

A7.text: Engineering focuses principally on functionality or utility of products.

A8.text: Mechanical engineers use thermo-science to design engines and power plants, heating, ventilation, and air-conditioning (HVAC) systems, heat exchangers, heat sinks, radiators, refrigeration, insulation, and others.

A9.text: Design and drafting Drafting or technical drawing is the means by which mechanical engineers design products and create instructions for manufacturing parts.
